query: SELECT id, siteNumber, centreId FROM sites WHERE centreId = (SELECT id FROM shopping_centres WHERE name = 'Waverley Gardens');
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 21ksxipa4kLneoE.root --database 6yeAhZnHexQXKcGnnUhDLE --execute SELECT id, siteNumber, centreId FROM sites WHERE centreId = (SELECT id FROM shopping_centres WHERE name = 'Waverley Gardens');
